Name: Treefender
About the game: Recently, there's been a lot of news of UFO sightings above town, and your own build spacescanner is picking up some weird signals as well.. Time to assemble the Treefenders: an alliance of neighbourhood kids, determined to keep the neighbourhood save! Relive your childhood in Treefender, a VR-exclusive 4 player online co-op simulator game where you build your own treefort and defend it against an alien invasion! Build The treefort of your nostalgic dreams. With intuitive buildtools and many buildpieces to pick from. Defend Yourself, and your buddies (4 player online co-op) against grumpy space squids, set out to destroy every tree in the universe! Expand Your treefort with new abilities, wonky buildobjects and wacky weapons you research. Hint: The gnomes are highly volatile!
